item.title: Introducing Embra, a fast ChatGPT-like assistant that lives on your Mac desktop & integrates into your apps!
item.description:
Zach Tratar on Twitter

‚ÄúIntroducing Embra, a fast ChatGPT-like assistant that lives on your Mac desktop & integrates into your apps! Starting with Chrome. Use it to: - Access ChatGPT-like conversations instantly - Query documents or websites (even PDFs!) - Write context-rich docs, code, and emails 1/3‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/zachtratar/status/1623015294569713665?s=20&t=cQPygm89as-VVomGKwuodw

source: Tuesday assorted links

item.title: BioGPTLarge
item.description:
Katie Link on Twitter

‚ÄúBioGPT-Large was just released by Microsoft ü§© Trained from scratch on biomedical text, it‚Äôs the current leader on the PubMedQA benchmark at 81% accuracy (human performance = 78%). It‚Äôs also freely available on the @huggingface hub to try out (and fine-tune)!‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/katieelink/status/1622635429202898944

item.title: Alexey on DAN, one expletive is deployed
item.description:
Alexey Guzey on Twitter

‚Äúi can‚Äôt stop thinking about this - my first reaction is ‚Äúfuck, these people are so cruel‚Äù is this an insane reaction? is it possible to be cruel to an LLM? will humans abusing the model now be in its train set forever and it will hate us the way we hate people who abuse us?‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/alexeyguzey/status/1622994698716712960

Harrison Kinsley on Twitter

‚ÄúA project to keep an eye on: https://t.co/wvyriUffEP The goal: A truly open ChatGPT like assistant, and beyond, currently targeting a ~24GB-memory-to-run model. You can help right now with the RLHF stage: https://t.co/3RzhRLZXAK‚Äù

item.title: weird and offensive remarks on PoMo and AI
item.description:
Zero H.P. Lovecraft ü¶Öüêç on Twitter

‚ÄúAnyway, technology democratizes philosophy. Neech got it on his own. Lyotard derived it from G√∂del. For this genius, post-modernism clicked when he paid an Indian fiver to use Chinese AI to put a Moroccan girl‚Äôs head on a Ukrainian camgirl‚Äôs body https://t.co/nruzCg9RHd‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/0x49fa98/status/1621970270410907649

source: Monday assorted links

item.title: Tim Bresnahan on the FTC and the Meta decision
item.description:
Tim Bresnahan on Twitter

‚ÄúMuch discussion of a Court‚Äôs decision not to grant a Preliminary Injunction to the FTC in the Meta - Within merger. I have no inside info, but 1) There is nothing novel in the Court‚Äôs opinion. 2) I have a very different take on what role Economics might have played here. 1/7‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/timobres/status/1622274391219515392
